mapper.update: UPDATE PARENTS_BOARD SET PAB_TITLE = #{pab_title}, PAB_CONTENTS = #{pab_contents}, PAB_COUNT = PAB_COUNT - 1 WHERE PAB_ID = #{pab_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT PAB_ID , PAB_TITLE , B.PAA_USERNAME , C.PAC_CATEGORY , PAB_DATE , PAB_COUNT FROM PARENTS_BOARD A JOIN PARENTS_ACCOUNT B ON A.PAB_WRITER = B.PAA_ID JOIN PAB_CATEGORY C ON A.PAB_CATEGORY = C.PAC_ID ORDER BY PAB_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT PAB_ID, C.PAC_CATEGORY, PAB_TITLE, B.PAA_USERNAME, PAB_DATE, PAB_COUNT FROM PARENTS_BOARD A JOIN PARENTS_ACCOUNT B ON A.PAB_WRITER = B.PAA_ID JOIN PAB_CATEGORY C ON A.PAB_CATEGORY = C.PAC_ID WHERE A.PAB_WRITER = #{id} AND ROWNUM <= 20 ORDER BY 1
